titles.title: Increased Access to Health Insurance Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit health insurance to be purchased from a health savings account.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/28/2007--Introduced.
Increased Access to Health Insurance Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the prohibition against the purchase of health insurance from a health savings account.
